Generation III.Ruby: Walrein 's two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This Pok é mon 's thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
Generation III.Sapphire: Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.
Generation III.Emerald: To protect its herd, the leader battles anything that invades its territory, even at the cost of its life. Its tusks may snap off in battle.
Generation III.FireRed: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. It is protected by its thick blubber.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. It is protected by its thick blubber.

Generation IV.Diamond: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
Generation IV.Pearl: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
Generation IV.Platinum: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.

Generation IV.SoulSilver: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.

Generation V.White 2: Not only does its thick blubber keep it warm, it also protects it from attacks. It shatters ice with its prized tusks.

Generation VI.X: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Walrein's two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing 10 tons with one blow. This Pokémon's thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Walrein swims all over in frigid seawater while crushing icebergs with its grand, imposing tusks. Its thick layer of blubber makes enemy attacks bounce off harmlessly.

Generation VIII.Sword: Walrein form herds of 20 to 30 individuals. When a threat appears, the herd's leader will protect the group with its life.
Generation VIII.Shield: Walrein's tusks keep growing throughout its life. Tusks broken in battle will grow back to their usual impressive size in a year.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold but also enemy attacks.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold but also enemy attacks.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Its thick tusks are strong enough to shatter drift ice. They have been known to break, but they will grow back by the next year. The Hisui region is well known for these broken tusks.
